snippet: The sentencing of Pfc. Bradley Manning for the largest leak of confidential materials in American history is scheduled for Wednesday morning.
abstract: Pfc Bradley Manning is posed to be sentenced for providing more than 700,000 secret government documents to WikiLeaks, largest leak of confidential materials in American history; faces up to 90 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: The sentencing of Pfc. Bradley Manning for the largest leak of confidential materials in American history is scheduled for Wednesday morning.

headline.main: Manning to Be Sentenced in Leaks Case
headline.print_headline: Sentencing Set for Today for Manning in Leaks Case
